Well my experience with this so far: You still need the steam.api.dll from Dead Island update 1 to play the game. It seems it fixes the German sound issue (Soldiers in combat talked English before) as well BUT when I got to the Railway Station I had a total PC crash (freeze) dunno why. But it looks as there will be many more updates so thx and we will see if it improves.
